languages.text: "Кто ты так{mf|ой|ая}, чтобы {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}перечить самой судьбе{/d} во имя чужих участей? Столько нитей, протянутых к другим созданиям твоего мира — жалкие, ничтожные связи, что можно смахнуть одним движением. Запутанный, небрежный, бессмысленный клубок".

"Who are you to {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}oppose destiny itself{/d} for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."
languages.original_text: "Кто ты так{mf|ой|ая}, чтобы {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}перечить самой судьбе{/d} во имя чужих участей? Столько нитей, протянутых к другим созданиям твоего мира — жалкие, ничтожные связи, что можно смахнуть одним движением. Запутанный, небрежный, бессмысленный клубок".

traits.locale_text: "So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."
"So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."

"Who are you to oppose destiny itself for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."
"So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."

"Who are you to oppose destiny itself for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."

languages.text: “你有什么资格，竟敢为了其他人的性命而{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}违逆命运{/d}的安排？你与你的世界中的其他生物之间，连接着如此多的丝线。这些可悲的联系毫无价值，哪怕是最轻微的触碰，也会让它们断裂。这些丝线是如此飘忽不定，如此毫无意义。”
languages.original_text: "Who are you to {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}oppose destiny itself{/d} for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."

traits.locale_text: “你与你的世界中的其他生物之间，连接着如此多的丝线。这些可悲的联系毫无价值，哪怕是最轻微的触碰，也会让它们断裂。这些丝线是如此飘忽不定，如此毫无意义。”

languages.text: «¿Quién eres tú para {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}oponerte al destino{/d} por unas vidas que no son la tuya? Se extiende un gran número de hilos entre ti y otras criaturas de tu mundo... vínculos patéticos y triviales que se cortarán con el menor toque. Una maraña confusa, errática y sin sentido».
languages.original_text: "Who are you to {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}oppose destiny itself{/d} for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."

traits.locale_text: «Se extiende un gran número de hilos entre ti y otras criaturas de tu mundo... vínculos patéticos y triviales que se cortarán con el menor toque. Una maraña confusa, errática y sin sentido».

languages.text: 「自らの命のためにもなく、{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}運命そのものに逆らう{/d}のは何故だ？お前とお前の世界の生物の間には、極めて多くの糸が張り巡らされている。哀れで無価値なつながりで、ほんの少し触れただけで今にも砕け散ってしまいそうだ。ごちゃごちゃで、不安定で、無意味なもつれだ」
languages.original_text: "Who are you to {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}oppose destiny itself{/d} for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."

traits.locale_text: 「お前とお前の世界の生物の間には、極めて多くの糸が張り巡らされている。哀れで無価値なつながりで、ほんの少し触れただけで今にも砕け散ってしまいそうだ。ごちゃごちゃで、不安定で、無意味なもつれだ」
「自らの命のためにもなく、{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}運命そのものに逆らう{/d}のは何故だ？お前とお前の世界の生物の間には、極めて多くの糸が張り巡らされている。哀れで無価値なつながりで、ほんの少し触れただけで今にも砕け散ってしまいそうだ。ごちゃごちゃで、不安定で、無意味なもつれだ」

languages.text: « De quel droit {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}vous opposez-vous au destin lui-même{/d} dans le seul but de sauver des vies qui ne vous appartiennent pas ? Tous ces fils qui s'étendent entre votre être et d'autres créatures de votre monde... Des liens misérables, sans la moindre valeur, prêts à se briser au premier contact. Un enchevêtrement incohérent et vain. »
languages.original_text: "Who are you to {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}oppose destiny itself{/d} for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."

traits.locale_text: « Tous ces fils qui s'étendent entre votre être et d'autres créatures de votre monde... Des liens misérables, sans la moindre valeur, prêts à se briser au premier contact. Un enchevêtrement incohérent et vain. »

languages.text: "Wer seid Ihr, dass Ihr Euch {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}gegen das Schicksal stellt{/d} und dafür Leben opfert, die Euch nicht gehören? Es gibt so viele Fäden zwischen Euch und anderen Kreaturen Eurer Welt – kümmerliche, wertlose Verbindungen, die bei der geringsten Berührung zerbrechen. Ein ungeordnetes, zielloses, sinnloses Gewirr."
languages.original_text: "Who are you to {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}oppose destiny itself{/d} for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt so viele Fäden zwischen Euch und anderen Kreaturen Eurer Welt – kümmerliche, wertlose Verbindungen, die bei der geringsten Berührung zerbrechen. Ein ungeordnetes, zielloses, sinnloses Gewirr."

languages.text: "Kendi canından başka canlar uğruna {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}kadere karşı çıkmak{/d} haddine mi? Seninle yaşadığın dünyanın diğer yaratıkları arasında uzanan nice iplikler var. Acınası, hiçbir değeri olmayan bağlar bunlar. En ufak temasta kopmaya hazırlar. Birbirine dolanmış, intizamsız ve manasız bir yumak."
languages.original_text: "Who are you to {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}oppose destiny itself{/d} for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi canından başka canlar uğruna kadere karşı çıkmak haddine mi? Seninle yaşadığın âlemin diğer yaratıkları arasında uzanan nice iplikler var. Acınası, hiçbir değeri olmayan bağlar bunlar. En ufak temasta kopmaya hazırlar. Birbirine dolanmış, intizamsız ve manasız bir yumak."

languages.original_text: "Who are you to oppose destiny itself for the sake of lives that are not your own? So many threads stretch between you and other creatures of your world — pitiful, worthless links, ready to shatter at the slightest touch. A muddled, erratic, pointless tangle."
